content: I'm glad the NHL is back too. That much we have in common. But...perhaps it's only a small minority of people who take an elitist attitude towards hunters.  :-)

Being a vegetarian makes it very difficult to watch the OLN channel and I must add that being a vegetarian and not liking OLN doesn't make me an elitist.  I solve the problem by watching hockey on Center Ice.  $129 a year is well worth it!

I'll take any hockey, regardless of the commercial interruptions.
Wango Tango, baby.  

PS: The Pens finally won one!  Wahoo!
